page.title: 10SEA WALL FARM
page.content: {Sea Wall Farm}is one of the many dairy farms near the {West End of Clevedon.} {Mrs.Kostyla}has been living there for 57 years.She has two sons who help her on the farm and two daughters. The farm was built in 1648 and rebuilt in 1896.Mrs.Kostyla was born on the farm and was brought up with dairy farming.She says she will never leave the farm and she also thinks she is the only person with the name Kostyla in England. She has 93 cows in her herd as well as 3 calves this year.She has 11 sheep and 2 horses,2 cats and 34 chickens.She has a pet lamb called spot. An unusual feature of this farm is the duck sanctuary where injured birds may be brought for treatment and safety.
